categoriesExplanation: The primary focus of the video is on 'breathwork' as evident from repeated mentions in the TITLE ('Morning Breathwork Practice'), TAGS ('morning breathwork practice', 'breathwork for productivity'), and DESCRIPTION ('gentle morning breath practice', 'connecting to your breath'). Furthermore, user comments speak highly about the effectiveness and routine use of the breathwork practice, specifically pointing out its utility in calming and energizing ('calm and present energy', 'about the skill of breathwork'). There is no mention of physical exercise, equipment use, or other fitness modalities, confirming a strong score for 'Breathing exercises' at 0.95. The chosen category reflects the emphasis on breath as the central element rather than a specific fitness activity or physical training. Other categories are excluded due to the absence of such activities in the metadata.
